long_description: Get grounded in your poses with the soft and flowing women's Refresh Pants from Lole. From the yoga studio to lounging around the house, they're made to move comfortably with you. A soft blend of recycled polyester and elastane offers 4-way stretch, dries quickly and protects from UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. The women's Refresh Pants from Lole offer a low rise and relaxed fit. Waistband drawcord; hand pockets; zip side pocket; drawcords at cuffs; reflective logo.
short_description: Get grounded in your poses with the soft and flowing women's Refresh Pants from Lole. From the yoga studio to lounging around the house, they're made to move comfortably with you.
